attributes.action: Hold a public inquiry into institutional racism in the Police Forces.
attributes.additional_details: To investigate the levels of institutional racism in the Police force and bring in safeguards for people who complain about racism in the Police force who can suffer victimisation.
attributes.background: Hold a public inquiry into institutional racism in the police force, investigating Black deaths in custody, use of force on Black people, stop and search on Black people and arrests on Black people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Conduct and publish an independent review into race relations with the Police: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324314

Review the use of force against BAME people by the police: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329599

Implement legislative reform of our policing system to tackle racism: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323805
